reviewDescription: Writing this review after using it for 4 months.I ordered multiple bluetooth speakers including some Boat bluetooth speakers but was never satisfied with the quality of music until I ordered this one.Important:If you are looking for a bluetooth speaker to take calls, don't buy this, instead you can go for Boat speakers. They offer very good call quality but not upto date music quality.This speaker is great for music listening but bad for calls.Battery quality is absolutely chinese. Reduction in Battery backup starts soon. After 4 months I'm getting 1 hour of music listening on full volume. If you reduce colume to 60-70% you get 3 - 4 hours.It's comes at very reasonable price compared to the quality it offers...

reviewTitle: The best not one of the best üëç
reviewDescription: Mark my words that you wont find a better speaker under 2k better than this soundrum p. The manufacturer has tuned it in a bassy and loud speaker . My only concern is that it sometimes produces base in particular areas where the base should be silent like in some bollywood songs or non bassy songs like jazz/some pop but u will be able to tackle this by an Equalizer. One out of 10-15 songs happend to be as such so totally not a big issue. Battery my god !!  it rocks, below 50% it will give 8-9 hrs and 50% is loud enough to bang ur party in a 13/13 room. Last thing it doesn't sound like a Bluetooth speaker when volume is above 60% it behaves like complete speaker with woofer. Jbl or sony may have better trebles by 10% but base nah soundrum is OP and valur for money üí∞ . Thanks amazon , a very good purchase ü§ò

reviewDescription: It is useful for music lovers and elders who unable to hear thru normal phone. The given good option is inbuilt mic. But unfortunately I did not received 'C' type charging cable and user manual. After open the parcel notice the accessoires are not accompanied along with the item immediately I did a compliant and told by some customer care official s it will be resolved or solution will be given within 4 days. But no body turned back so far. It is very unfortunate thing.  Some body should take care about the customer either from service provider or seller.  Okay I bought 'C' type cable and got operation knowledge by watching some Utube videos.  The worst thing is no body is turned back and not given any response.  I don't know how to understand.  So request you guys, think twice while buying costly items thru Amazon and it's suppliers/service providers. Coming to the item , the sound quality and bass is good.
